news.title: David Hunter: 'Start Buying Gold ASAP', Target $5,000 in 3-6 Months
news.summary: Contrarian macro strategist David Hunter urges immediate accumulation of gold, predicting a final 'melt-up' that could push prices to $5,000 within the next quarter.

news.title: Kalshi Ends Polymarket Dominance with 60% Share
news.summary: The prediction market landscape has shifted drastically; regulated exchange Kalshi now captures 60% of market share as institutional volumes surge.

news.title: ICE Launches 'Polymarket Signals' for Wall Street Institutions
news.summary: Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) has launched a dedicated sentiment tool for professional investors, legitimizing prediction market data as a core signal for traditional finance.

macro.insight: Normalized prediction market data is now being integrated into institutional workflows to capture real-time sentiment shifts.

metals.insight: Institutions remain long-term bullish on gold despite short-term volatility, validating the rebound as a key entry point.

crypto.insight: The launch of verifiable social intelligence tools marks a shift toward transparency in tracking crypto social sentiment.

social_intelligence.insight: Surge in high-frequency 5-minute bets indicates a shift toward short-term volatility capture over long-term conviction.
Institutional accumulation is being quietly mirrored by 'bargain hunters' stepping in at the $5,000 floor.
Arbitrage opportunities persist between Polymarket (55c) and Kalshi (62c), signaling fragmented liquidity.
